snippet: Jordan Roberts, the novice director of the problem-plagued comedy, “3, 2, 1 ... Frankie Go Boom,” may get the last laugh.
abstract: Jordan Roberts, director of film 3,2,1 ... Frankie Go Boom, is defying the odds for success, given the financial, technological and staffing problems he encountered while making the comedy farce; film, which has already made the rounds on the festival circuit, will be arriving in theaters for a limited run in October.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Roberts, the novice director of the problem-plagued comedy, “3, 2, 1 ... Frankie Go Boom,” may get the last laugh.

headline.seo: Jordan Roberts and His Comedy ‘3, 2, 1 Frankie Go Boom’
headline.main: New Director Is Outrunning His Hard Luck
headline.print_headline: New Director Is Outrunning His Hard Luck
